name: Parkcorn
description:
Parkcorn is a plattformer... without plattform! Beware of spikes and use wall-jumping and gliding to reach the goal!

Parkcorn was made in the Game Maker's Toolkit GameJam 2018 under the theme

GENRE, but you can't MECHANIC

Parkorn was made by Jozzua Lance, Le Don, Kmspirit and SmashArtist.
